mapper.select: SELECT REPORT_DATE , CATEGORY1 , CATEGORY2 , REPORT_DESC , INCOME , INCOMER , EXPENSE , EXPENSER , INOUT_METHOD , INST_USER , INST_DATE , UPD_USER , UPD_DATE FROM INCOME_EXPENSE_REPORT
